name: Lancer RPG // VTT Landing Page
description:
This template was made for players of Lancer RPG, a tabletop role-playing game about mechs in the far future.

It was designed to help GM's and players keep track of recent events, and ongoing status of the game, through short messages and mission summaries.

This project is a Landing Page for use with any VTT software (e.g.: Roll20 or Foundry VTT).


How to use

  1. Take the template, and fill the relevant information on the available fields. Duplicate the fields as seen fit.
  2. Export and use it with your VTT of choice.

The components are available in a separate page.


Credits

This project was heavily inspired by Comp/Con, the companion app to Lancer RPG, and by the core rulebook's layout.

The icons found in this template are also from Comp/Con or based on their icon set.


Planet pixel art by Deep Fold Planet Generator.

Mirrorsmoke Background Texture by Starline @ Freepik

Horus Background Texture by Rawpixel @ Freepik


Lancer RPG was created by Miguel Lopez and Tom Parkinson Morgan.

Comp/Con was developed by John Arena.
